model

Class BoardObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BoardObservable

  • public class BoardObservable
extends java.lang.Object
    BoardObservable is a class that creates a list of observers to be observed and notified. This class is used to notify the observers of any changes regarding the game board.
    Author:
    Ali Arfan, Kent Erlend Bratteng Knudsen, Stian Tornholm Grimsgaard
